Articles.Content: So I did a quick search and a few mods came up but the ones I want are outdated now. I'm looking for a mod that gives more realistic sounding rocket engines, very much like this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53800-RELEASED-A-R-P-mod-%28-Audio-Replacement-Project-%29. Unfortunately it's outdated which kinda sucks given that it looks very promising! Anyone have any ideas for this type of mod?

Hot Rockets

It has improved sounds I think., of course if you don't like the rocket effects, that might be problematic.

Also RCS Sound
